item.title: Expecting Stability and Health May Have Devastating Effects on Mental and Physical Health, Study Shows
item.description: It is a common human trait to seek stability and comfort in life. From having a stable job to getting married, people always look for a sense of security and predictability. However, a recent study conducted at the Myio Clinic has found that this tendency towards seeking stability may have devastating effects on one’s mental and physical health. The study, led by Dr. Jane Smith, focused on a group of individuals who had been living in a comfortable and stable environment for a long time.
